cast.name: 英迪娅·希克斯 India Hicks
克里斯蒂·特林顿 Christy Turlington
乔丹·贝尔福特 Jordan Belfort

introduction: Piers Morgan Tonight is a talk show on CNN, hosted by Piers Morgan.[1] The show premiered on January 17, 2011 and filled the former Larry King Live timeslot. His first guest was Oprah Winfrey.[2] He has since filmed interviews with Howard Stern, Condoleezza Rice, Ricky Gervais, George Clooney, Rudy Giuliani, Mitt Romney, Joel Osteen and Victoria Osteen, Kim Kardashian and Kourtney Kardashian, Colin Firth, Kid Rock, Rod Stewart and Donald Trump and Melania Trump respectively.The theme music is written by Anthony James, composer and CEO of British company Music Candy, and his writing partner Yiorgos Bellapaisiotis, Creative Director for Music Candy.
